notes: typo related to the accent mark. Should be pipi instead of pipí. Note that pipí is the one in the original form, but if you keep the accent mark means urine.

be aware that in Mexico people generally use camión rather than troca. The most accurate gloss for camión is truck. Troca is mostly used in northern Mexico or by mexican-americans. For that particular population troca means a pickup truck.

the definition is not a common word for people from mexico. Typically mexicans name "mantequilla de maní" to say peanut butter. My hypothesis is that mexican-americans use this word more often.
globo is coherent with air ballon. However the word bomba means bomb. Bomba is used by northern west mexicans and mexican americans.
